author: Reuters
title: Ethiopia declares state of emergency to curb spread of COVID-19
description: Ethiopia’s Prime Minister, Abiy Ahmed, on April 8 declared a state of emergency in the country to help curb the spread of the new coronavirus, his office said on Twitter.“Considering the gravity of th
content:
Ethiopias Prime Minister, Abiy Ahmed, on April 8 declared a state of emergency in the country to help curb the spread of the new coronavirus, his office said on Twitter.
